content: In IG's CapabilityStatement http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/CapabilityStatement-bulk-data.json.html, there are three export operations listed. According the CapabilityStatement resource, "The name of the operation or query. For an operation, this is the name prefixed with $ and used in the URL." All of three should have the same name "export".
